data.title: Marisa Pavan
data.text:
AKA Marisa Pierangeli

Born: 19-Jun-1932

Birthplace: Cagliari, Sardinia, Italy

Gender: Female

Race or Ethnicity: White

Sexual orientation: Straight

Occupation: Actor

Nationality: Italy

Executive summary: The Rose Tattoo

Sister: Pier Angeli (actress, b. 19-Jun-1932, d. 10-Sep-1971 suicide)

Husband: Jean-Pierre Aumont (actor, m. 1956, d. 30-Jan-2001, two sons)

Son: Jean-Claude

Son: Patrick

FILMOGRAPHY AS ACTOR

Chris & Don: A Love Story (31-Aug-2007) · Herself

A Slightly Pregnant Man (20-Sep-1973)

Solomon and Sheba (24-Dec-1959) · Abishag

John Paul Jones (16-Jun-1959) · Aimee de Tellison

The Midnight Story (4-Jul-1957)

The Man in the Gray Flannel Suit (12-Apr-1956) · Maria

Diane (12-Jan-1956)

The Rose Tattoo (12-Dec-1955) · Rosa Delle Rose

Drum Beat (17-Nov-1954) · Toby

Down Three Dark Streets (2-Sep-1954) · Julie Angelino

What Price Glory (22-Aug-1952)
